com.spinn3r.api.protobuf
Class ProtobufToXML

java.lang.Object
  com.spinn3r.api.protobuf.ProtobufToXML

public class ProtobufToXML
extends java.lang.Object

Class converts our protobuf output format into the rss output format. The output is the same as the XML returned by the RSS versions of the same API calls (ignoring order) with the following exceptions:

  1. The protobuf output format originally did not include irankings.
  2. The protobuf output format did not originally include a description of the channel
  3. The RSS output pubDate is actually the date found. therefore, the pubDates will not match.

Author:
jwu
